name: Ruxx
description:
This is a prototype of Ruxx, a small game where you have to dodge projectiles and aim to get the highest score you possibly can.

Ruxx is a project I work on during my free time. If I have the time I'll work on bringing out updates/fixes to the game but don't expect any schedules. Ruxx is also free of charge and I have no plans to ever charge money/implement any form of payment.

The game is playable but bugs or errors can occur, should you encounter problems you can always leave a comment.
